body.head: MHD.
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: ANDRWN ARISTWN, O*I TO PAGCRUSON DERAV
$SPELIA: METHLQON. OU GAR AN DESPOIN' EMH
NUN D' ECQRA PANTA, KAI NOSEI TA FILTATA.
PRODOUV GAR A*UTOU TEKNA DESPOTIN T' EMHN
KEITAI D' ASITOV, SWM' UFEIS' ALGHDOSI,
OUT' OMM' EPAIROUS' OUT' APALLASSOUSA GHV
HN MH POTE STREYASA PALLEUKON DERHN
AUTH PROV A*UTHN PATER' APOIMWXH: FILON
KAI GAIAN OIKOUV Q', O*UV PRODOUS' AFIKETO
MET' ANDROV *OV SFE NUN ATIMASAV ECEI.
DEDOIKA D' AUTHN MH TI BOULEUSH: NEON.
BAREIA GAR FRHN, OUD' ANEXETAI KAKWV
PASCOUS'. EG=W:DA THNDE, DEIMANW TE NIN
H KAI TURANNON TON TE GHMANTA KTANH:,
DEINH GAR. OUTOI RA:DIWV GE SUMBALWN
ALL' O*IDE PAIDEV EK TROCWN PEPAUMENOI
KAKWN. NEA GAR FRONTIV OUK ALGEIN FILEI.
body.speaker: PG
body.ab: TI PROV PULAISI THND' AGOUS' ERHMIAN
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: EGW GAR EV TOUT' EKBEBHK' ALGHDONOV,
body.speaker: PG
TR
body.ab: ZHLW S'. EN ARCH: PHMA KO=UDEPW MESOI.
body.speaker: PG
body.ab: W MWROV.... EI CRH DESPOTAV EIPEIN TODE.
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: TI D' ESTIN, W GERAIE ? MH FQONEI FRASAI.
body.speaker: PG
body.ab: OUDEN. METEGNWN KAI TA PROSQ' EIRHMENA.
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: MH, PROV GENEIOU, KRUPTE SUNDOULON SEQEN.
SIGHN GAR, EI CRH, TWNDE QHSOMAI PERI
body.speaker: PG
body.ab: HKOUSA TOU LEGONTOV, OU DOKWN KLUEIN,
SUN MHTRI MELLOI THSDE KOIRANOV CQONOV
OUK OIDA. BOULOIMHN D' AN OUK EINAI TODE.
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: PASCONTAV, EI KAI MHTRI DIAFORAN ECEI ?
body.speaker: PG
body.ab: KO=UK EST' EKEINOV TOISDE DWMASIN FILOV.
body.speaker: TR
PG
body.ab: ATAR SU G' .... OU GAR KAIROV EIDENAI TODE
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: W TEKN', AKOUEQ' O*IOV EIV UMAV PATHR ?
OLOITO MEN MH. DESPOTHV GAR EST' EMOV.
ATAR KAKOV G' WN EV FILOUV *ALISKETAI.
body.speaker: PG
body.ab: TIV D' OUCI QNHTWN ? ARTI GIGNWSKEIV TO'DE,
*WV PAV TIV A*UTOV TOU PELAV MALLON FILEI,
O*I MEN DIKAIWV, O*I DE KAI KERDOUV CARIN,
EI TOUSDE G' EUNHV O*UNEK' OU STERGEI PATHR.
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: IT'.... EU GAR ESTAI .... DWMATWN ESW, TEKNA.
SU D' *WV MALISTA TOUSD' ERHMWSAV ECE
HDH GAR EIDON OMMA NIN TAUROUMENHN
COLOU, SAF' OIDA, PRIN KATASKHYAI TINA ...
ECQROUV GE MENTOI, MH FILOV, DRASEIE TI.
body.speaker: MH
TR
MH
body.ab: SUN PATRI, KAI PAV DOMOV ERROI.
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: TI DE SOI PAIDEV PATROV AMPLAKIAV
TO GAR EIQISQAI ZHN EP' ISOISIN
KREISSON. EMOI GOUN EN MH MEGALOIV
TWN GAR METRIWN PRWTA MEN EIPEIN
body.speaker: CO
body.ab: LEXON. EP' AMFIPULOU GAR ESW MELAQROU BOAN
EKLUON. OUDE SUNHDOMAI, W GUNAI, ALGESIN
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: OUK EISI DOMOI. FROUDA TAD' HDH.
TON MEN GAR ECEI LEKTRA TURANNWN,
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: BAIH. TI DE MOI ZHN ETI KERDOV ?
body.speaker: CO
MH
body.ab: POSIN ? *ON POT' EGW NUMFAN T' ESIDOIM'
body.speaker: TR
CO
body.ab: ALLA BASA NIN DEURO POREUSON OIKWN
body.speaker: TR
body.ab: DRASW TAD'. ATAR FOBOV EI PEISW
SKAIOUV DE LEGWN KO=UDEN TI SOFOUV
EPI T' EILAPINAIV KAI PARA DEIPNOIV
TO PARON GAR ECEI TERYIN AF' A*UTOU
body.speaker: CO
MH
body.ab: MH MOI TI MEMFHSQ'. OIDA GAR POLLOUV BROTWN
SEMNOUV GEGWTAV, TOUV MEN OMMATWN APO,
TOUV D' EN QURAIOIV. O*I D' AF' *HSUCOU PODOV
DIKH GAR OUK ENEST' EN QFQALMOIV BROTWN,
CRH DE XENON MEN KARTA PROSCWREIN POLEI....
EMOI D' AELPTON PRAGMA PROSPESON TODE
YUCHN DIEFQARK'. OICOMAI DE KAI BIOU
EN *W: GAR HN MOI PANTA GIGNWSKEIN KALWV,
PANTWN D' *OS' EST' EMYUCA KAI GNWMHN ECEI
LABEIN. KAKOU GAR TOUT' ET' ALGION KAKON.
K=AN TW:D' AGWN MEGISTOV, H KAKON LABEIN
H CRHSTON. OU GAR EUKLEEIV APALLAGAI
GUNAIXIN, OUD' O*ION T' ANHNASQAI POSIN.
EV KAINA D' HQH KAI NOMOUV AFIGIENHN
DEI MANTIN EINAI, MH MAQOUSAN OIKOQEN,
POSIV XUNOIKH: MH BIA: FERWN ZUGON,
ZHLWTOV AIWN. EI DE MH, QANEIN CREWN.
ANHR D', *OTAN TOIV ENDON ACQHTAI XUNWN,
$$SPURIOUS [H PROV FILON TIN' H PROV *HLIKA TRAPEIV.]
*HMIN D' ANAGKH PROV MIAN YUCHN BLEPEIN.
ZWMEN KAT' OIKOUV, O*I DE MARNANTAI DORI.
KAKWV FRONOUNTEV. *WV TRIV AN PAR' ASPIDA
STHNAI QELOIM' AN MALLON H TEKEIN *APAX.
ALL' OU GAR A*UTOV PROV SE K=AM' *HKEI LOGOV.
SOI MEN POLIV Q' *HD' ESTI KAI PATROV DOMOI
BIOU T' ONHSIV KAI FILWN SUNOUSIA,
EGW D' ERHMOV APOLIV OUS' UBRIZOMAI
PROV ANDROV, EK GHV BARBAROU LELH:SMENH,
OU MHTER', OUK ADELFON, OUCI SUGGENH
HN MOI POROV TIV MHCANH T' EXEUREQH:
$$SPURIOUS [TON DONTA T' AUTW: QUGATER' *H T' EGHMATO]
SIGAN. GUNH GAR T=ALLA MEN FOBOU PLEA
KAKH T' EV ALKHN KAI SIDHRON EISORAN.
body.speaker: CO
body.ab: DRASW TAD'. ENDIKWV GAR EKTEISH: POSIN,
$MHDEIA. PENQEIN D' OU SE QAUMAZW TUCAV.
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: SE THN SKUQRWPON KAI POSEI QUMOUMENHN,
FUGADA, LABOUSAN DISSA SUN SAUTH: TEKNA.
KAI MH TI MELLEIN. *WV EGW BRABEUV LOGOU
TOUD' EIMI, KO=UK APEIMI PROV DOMOUV PALIN,
PRIN AN SE GAIAV TERMONWN EXW BALW.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: ECQROI GAR EXIASI PANTA DH KALWN,
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: DEDOIKA S'.... OUDEN DEI PARAMPISCEIN LOGOUV....
MH MOI TI DRASH:V PAID' ANHKESTON KAKON.
SOFH PEFUKAV KAI KAKWN POLLWN IDRIV,
KLUW D' APEILEIN S', *WV APAGGELLOUSI MOI,
TON DONTA KAI GHMANTA KAI GAMOUMENHN
DRASEIN TI. TAUT' OUN PRIN PAQEIN FULAXOMAI.
KREISSON DE MOI NUN PROV S' APECQESQAI, GUNAI,
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: OU NUN ME PRWTON, ALLA POLLAKIV, $KREON,
EBLAYE DOXA MEGALA T' EIRGASTAI KAKA.
CRH D' OUPOQ' *OSTIV ARTIFRWN PEFUK' ANHR
SKAIOUSI MEN GAR KAINA PROSFERWN SOFA
TWN D' AU DOKOUNTWN EIDENAI TI POIKILON
KREISSWN NOMISQEIV EN POLEI LUPROV FANH:.
EGW DE KA=UTH THSDE KOINWNW TUCHV.
SOFH GAR OUSA, TOIV MEN EIM' EPIFQONOV,
TOIV D' *HSUCAIA, TOIV DE QATEROU TROPOU,
TOIV D' AU PROSANTHV. EIMI D' OUK AGAN SOFH.
SU D' OUN FOBH: ME. MH TI PLHMMELEV PAQH:V ?
SU GAR TI M' HDIKHKAV ? EXEDOU KORHN
*OTW: SE QUMOV HGEN. ALL' EMON POSIN
MISW. SU D', OIMAI, SWFRONWN EDRAV TADE.
KAI NUN TO MEN SON OU FQONW KALWV ECEIN.
NUMFEUET', EU PRASSOITE. THNDE DE CQONA
EATE M' OIKEIN. KAI GAR HDIKHMENOI
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: LEGEIV AKOUSAI MALQAK', ALL' ESW FRENWN
ORRWDIA MOI MH TI BOULEUSH:V KAKON,
TOSW: DE G' *HSSON H PAROV PEPOIQA SOI.
GUNH GAR OXUQUMOV, *WV D' AUTWV ANHR,
ALL' EXIQ' *WV TACISTA, MH LOGOUV LEGE.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: MH, PROV SE GONATWN THV TE NEOGAMOU KORHV.
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: LOGOUV ANALOIV. OU GAR AN PEISAIV POTE.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: ALL' EXELA:V ME KO=UDEN AIDESH: LITAV ?
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: FILW GAR OU SE MALLON H DOMOUV EMOUV.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: W PATRIV, *WV SOU KARTA NUN MNEIAN ECW.
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: PLHN GAR TEKNWN EMOIGE FILTATON POLU.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: FEU FEU, BROTOIV ERWTEV *WV KAKON MEGA.
body.speaker: KR
MH
body.ab: $ZEU, MH LAQOI SE TWND' *OV AITIOV KAKWN.
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: *ERP'. W MATAIA, KAI M' APALLAXON PONWN.
body.speaker: MH
KR
body.ab: TAC' EX OPADWN CEIROV WSQHSH: BIA:.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: MH DHTA TOUTO G', ALLA S' AITOUMAI, $KREON...
body.speaker: KR
KR
body.ab: TI DAI BIAZH: KO=UK APALLASSH: CEROV ?
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: PAISIN T' AFORMHN TOIV EMOIV, EPEI PATHR
OIKTIRE D' AUTOUV. KAI SU TOI PAIDWN PATHR
PEFUKAV. EIKOV D' ESTIN EUNOIAN S' ECEIN.
TO=UMOU GAR OU MOI FRONTIV, EI FEUXOUMEQA,
body.speaker: KR
body.ab: *OMWV DE TEUXH: TOUDE. PROUNNEPW DE SOI,
KAI PAIDAV ENTOV THSDE TERMONWN CQONOV,
NUN D', EI MENEIN DEI, MIMN' EF' *HMERAN MIAN.
OU GAR TI DRASEIV DEINON *WN FOBOV M' ECEI.
body.speaker: CO
body.ab: FEU FEU, MELEA TWN SWN ACEWN.
POI POTE TREYH: ? TINA PROV XENIAN ?
H DOMON H CQONA SWTHRA KAKWN
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: ALL' OUTI TAUTH: TAUTA, MH DOKEITE PW.
ET' EIS' AGWNEV TOIV NEWSTI NUMFIOIV
KAI TOISI KHDEUSASIN OU SMIKROI PONOI.
DOKEIV GAR AN ME TONDE QWPEUSAI POTE,
EI MH TI KERDAINOUSAN H TECNWMENHN ?
OUD' AN PROSEIPON OUD' AN *HYAMHN CEROIN.
MEINAI M', EN *H: TREIV TWN EMWN ECQRWN NEKROUV
QHSW, PATERA TE KAI KORHN POSIN T' EMON.
ALL' *EN TI MOI PROSANTEV. EI LHFQHSOMAI
QANOUSA QHSW TOIV EMOIV ECQROIV GELWN.
KAI DH TEQNASI. TIV ME DEXETAI POLIV?
TIV GHN ASULON KAI DOMOUV ECEGGUOUV
OUK ESTI. MEINAS' OUN ETI SMIKRON CRONON,
HN MEN TIV *HMIN PURGOV ASFALHV FANH:,
DOLW: METEIMI TONDE KAI SIGH: FONON.
HN D' EXELAUNH: XUMFORA M' AMHCANOV,
AUTH XIFOV LABOUSA, KE=I MELLW QANEIN,
KTENW SFE, TOLMHV D' EIMI PROV TO KARTERON.
OU GAR MA THN DESPOINAN *HN EGW SEBW
CAIRWN TIV AUTWN TO=UMON ALGUNEI KEAR.
PIKROUV D' EGW SFIN KAI LUGROUV QHSW GAMOUV,
PIKRON DE KHDOV KAI FUGAV EMAV CQONOV.
*ERP' EV TO DEINON. NUN AGWN EUYUCIAV.
*ORA:V *A PASCEIV. OU GELWTA DEI S' OFLEIN
EPISTASAI DE. PROV DE KAI PEFUKAMEN
body.speaker: CO
body.ab: KAI DIKA KAI PANTA PALIN STREFETAI.
TAN D' EMAN EUKLEIAN ECEIN BIOTAN
ARSENWN GENNA:. MAKROV D' AIWN ECEI
SU D' EK MEN OIKWN PATRIWN EPLEUSAV
BEBAKE D' *ORKWN CARIV, OUD' ET' AIDWV
*$ELLADI TA: MEGALA: MENEI, AIQERIA D' ANEPTA.
body.speaker: IA
body.ab: OU NUN KATEIDON PRWTON ALLA POLLAKIV
SOI GAR PARON GHN THNDE KAI DOMOUV ECEIN
K=AMOI MEN OUDEN PRAGMA. MH PAUSH: POTE
*A D' EV TURANNOUV ESTI MOI LELEGMENA,
ORGAV AFH:ROUN KAI S' EBOULOMHN MENEIN.
SU D' OUC ANIEIV MWRIAV, LEGOUS' AEI
*OMWV DE K=AK TWND' OUK APEIRHKWV FILOIV
MHT' ENDEHV TOU. POLL' EFELKETAI FUGH
KAKA XUN A*UTH:. KAI GAR EI SU ME STUGEIV,
OUK AN DUNAIMHN SOI KAKWV FRONEIN POTE.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: W PAGKAKISTE, TOUTO GAR S' EIPEIN ECW,
$$ SPURIOUS [QEOIV TE K=AMOI PANTI T' ANQRWPWN GENEI?]
OUTOI QRASOV TOD' ESTIN OUD' EUTOLMIA,
ALL' *H MEGISTH TWN EN ANQRWPOIV NOSWN
PASWN, ANAIDEI'. EU D' EPOIHSAV MOLWN.
YUCHN KAKWV SE KAI SU LUPHSH: KLUWN.
EK TWN DE PRWTWN PRWTON ARXOMAI LEGEIN.
AUTH DE PATERA KAI DOMOUV PRODOUS' EMOUV
SUN SOI, PROQUMOV MALLON H SOFWTERA.
PAIDWN UP' AUTOU, PANTA T' EXEILON DOMON.
KAI TAUQ' UF' *HMWN, W KAKIST' ANDRWN, PAQWN
PAIDWN GEGWTWN. EI GAR HSQ' APAIV ETI,
SUGGNWST' AN HN SOI TOUD' ERASQHNAI LECOUV.
*ORKWN DE FROUDH PISTIV, OUD' ECW MAQEIN
H QEOUV NOMIZEIV TOUV TOT' OUK ARCEIN ETI,
H KAINA KEISQAI QESMI' ANQRWPOIV TA NUN,
EPEI SUNOISQA G' EIV EM' OUK EUORKOV WN.
FEU DEXIA CEIR, *HV SU POLL' ELAMBANOU,
AG'. *WV FILW: GAR ONTI SOI KOINWSOMAI
....DOKOUSA MEN TI PROV GE SOU PRAXEIN KALWV ?
NUN POI TRAPWMAI ? POTERA PROV PATROV DOMOUV,
O*UV SOI PRODOUSA KAI PATRAN AFIKOMHN ?
H PROV TALAINAV $PELIADAV ? KALWV G' AN OUN
ECEI GAR O*UTW. TOIV MEN OIKOQEN FILOIV
ECQRA KATESTHC', O*UV DE M' OUK ECRHN KAKWV
DRAN, SOI CARIN FEROUSA POLEMIOUV ECW.
EQHKAV ANTI TWNDE. QAUMASTON DE SE
ECW POSIN KAI PISTON *H TALAIN' EGW,
FILWN ERHMOV, SUN TECNOIV MONH MONOIV....
KALON G' ONEIDOV TW: NEWSTI NUMFIW:,
PTWCOUV ALASQAI PAIDAV *H T' ESW:SA SE.
W $ZEU, TI DH CRUSOU MEN *OV KIBDHLOV H:,
ANDRWN D' *OTW: CRH TON KAKON DIEIDENAI,
body.speaker: CO
body.ab: DEINH TIV ORGH KAI DUSIATOV PELEI,
body.speaker: IA
body.ab: DEI M', *WV EOIKE, MH KAKON FUNAI LEGEIN,
THN SHN STOMARGON, W GUNAI, GLWSSALGIAN.
EGW D', EPEIDH KAI LIAN PURGOIV CARIN,
SWTEIRAN EINAI QEWN TE K=ANQRWPWN MONHN.
SOI D' ESTI MEN NOUV LEPTOV....ALL' EPIFQONOV
ALL' OUK AKRIBWV AUTO QHSOMAI LIAN.
*OPH: GA0 OUN WNHSAV, OU KAKWV ECEI.
MEIZW GE MENTOI THV EMHV SWTHRIAV
NOMOIV TE CRHSQAI MH PROV ISCUOV CARIN.
PANTEV DE S' H:SQONT' OUSAN *$ELLHNEV SOFHN
KAI DOXAN ESCEV. EI DE GHV EP' ESCATOIV
*OROISIN W:KEIV, OUK AN HN LOGOV SEQEN.
EIH D' EMOIGE MHTE CRUSOV EN DOMOIV
TOSAUTA MEN SOI TWN EMWN PONWN PERI
*A D' EV GAMOUV MOI BASILIKOUV WNEIDISAV,
EN TW:DE DEIXW PRWTA MEN SOFOV GEGWV,
EPEITA SWFRWN, EITA SOI MEGAV FILOV
KAI PAISI TOIV EMOISIN.... ALL' EC' *HSUCOV.
TI TOUD' AN E*URHM' H*URON EUTUCESTERON
H PAIDA GHMAI BASILEWV FUGAV GEGWV ?
OUC, *H: SU KNIZH:, SON MEN ECQAIRWN LECOV,
ALL' *WV, TO MEN MEGISTON, OIKOIMEN KALWV
PENHTA FEUGEI PAV TIV EKPODWN FILOV,
PAIDAV DE QREYAIM' AXIWV DOMWN EMWN
SPEIRAV T' ADELFOUV TOISIN EK SEQEN TEKNOIV
EV TA=UTO QEIHN, KAI XUNARTHSAV GENOV
EUDAIMONOIMEN. SOI TE GAR PAIDWN TI DEI ?
EMOI TE LUEI TOISI MELLOUSIN TEKNOIV
TA ZWNT' ONHSAI. MWN BEBOULEUMAI KAKWV ?
OUD' AN SU FAIHV, EI SE MH KNIZOI LECOV.
HN D' AU GENHTAI XUMFORA TIV EV LECOV,
TIQESQE. CRHN GAR ALLOQEN POQEN BROTOUV
PAIDAV TEKNOUSQAI, QHLU D' OUK EINAI GENOV.
CO*UTWV AN OUK HN OUDEN ANQRWPOIV KAKON.
body.speaker: CO
body.ab: *OMWV D' EMOIGE KE=I PARA GNWMHN ERW,
DOKEIV PRODOUV SHN ALOCON OU DIKAIA DRAN.
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: H POLLA POLLOIV EIMI DIAFOROV BROTWN.
EMOI GAR *OSTIV ADIKOV WN SOFOV LEGEIN
GLWSSH: GAR AUCWN T=ADIK' EU PERISTELEIN,
TOLMA: PANOURGEIN. ESTI D' OUK AGAN SOFOV.
*WV KAI SU MH NUN EIV EM' EUSCHMWN GENH:
LEGEIN TE DEINOV. *EN GAR EKTENEI S' EPOV.
CRHN S', EIPER HSQA MH KAKOV, PEISANTA ME
GAMEIN GAMON TOND', ALLA MH SIGH: FILWN.
body.speaker: IA
body.ab: KALWV G' AN, OIMAI, TW:D' UPHRETEIV LOGW:,
EI SOI GAMON KATEIPON, *HTIV OUDE NUN
body.speaker: MH
body.ab: OU TOUTO S' EICEN, ALLA BARBARON LECOV
PROV GHRAV OUK EUDOXON EXEBAINE SOI.
body.speaker: IA
body.ab: EU NUN TOD' ISQI, MH GUNAIKOV O*UNEKA
GHMAI ME LEKTRA BASILEWN *A NUN ECW,
ALL', *WSPER EIPON KAI PAROV, SW:SAI QELWN

body.ab: MH MOI GENOITO LUPROV EUDAIMWN BIOV
MHD' OLBOV *OSTIV THN EMHN KNIZOI FRENA.
body.speaker: IA
body.ab: TA CRHSTA MH SOI LUPRA FAINESQAI POTE,

EGW D' ERHMOV THNDE FEUXOUMAI CQONA.

body.ab: AUTH TAD' E*ILOU. MHDEN' ALLON AITIW.

body.speaker: IA
MH
body.ab: KAI SOIV ARAIA G' OUSA TUGCANW DOMOIV.
body.speaker: IA
body.ab: *WV OU KRINOUMAI TWNDE SOI TA PLEIONA.
ALL', EI TI BOULH: PAISIN H SAUTHV FUGH:
XENOIV TE PEMPEIN SUMBOL', O*I DRASOUSI S' EU.
KAI TAUTA MH QELOUSA MWRANEIV, GUNAI.

body.ab: OUT' AN XENOISI TOISI SOIV CRHSAIMEQ' AN,
OUT' AN TI DEXAIMESQA, MHD' *HMIN DIDOU.
KAKOU GAR ANDROV DWR' ONHSIN OUK ECEI.

body.ab: ALL' OUN EGW MEN DAIMONAV MARTUROMAI,
*WV PANQ' UPOURGEIN SOI TE KAI TEKNOIV QELW.
